app_name: King James Bible (KJV) - Free Bible Verses + Audio
app_detail:
ğŸ‘‰King James Bible - KJV Bible AppğŸ‘ˆ is a free KJV Bible study tool that people read, listen to, share and learn King James Bible. This FREE Holy Bible App is the one that gets you closest to God and learns Godâ€™s word without internet access. It allows you to quickly jump to the exact Bible verse in the KJV translation with a simple design and create your own Bible verse collection, audio Bibles and private notes. 

ğŸ“–THE BEST BIBLE STUDY TOOL
- Access King James Bible anytime anywhere by swiping screen corner
- Off to a good start with an inspiring Bible verse from KJV Bible App each day
- Easy verse copying and pasting
- Study KJV Bible Offline
- Listen to audio Bibles offline
- Search the Bible with keywords
- Your Daily Bible verse will come up on your screen after you end a phone call
- Share Bible verses with your family and friends on Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram

ğŸ’–CUSTOMIZE YOUR FREE BIBLE
- Bookmarks: Catch up where you left off with a simple bookmark.
- Highlights: Mark favorite verses in different colors and manage them in the highlighted tab.
- Notes: Write down your own thoughts and share them with your friends.
- Font Adjustment: Choose any font sizes, colors, styles and line spacings you want.
- Reading plans: A large and increasing pool of reading plans to help you grow in your understanding of Godâ€™s words.
- Share verses with your friends and family via multiple platforms with ease

â›ªREAD BIBLE DAILY 
- Get closer to God with this King Jame Bible App (KJV Bible). This Bible app contains the King James Version of the Bible
- King James Bible Version (KJV), also known as KJV Bible, or the Authorized Version 
- Download to read, learn, and listen to the best King Jame Bible App (KJV Bible)
- Immersive Christian Bible verse reading experience
- Listening to audio Bible scriptures, reciting King James Bible versions of daily verses, sharing the Bible verses. All in one free KJV Bible App
- Use this free KJV Bible app for your daily devotional studying and Christian bible reading
- Connect with friends each day, reading Bible, sharing ideas, and asking questions. 
- The best Christian Bible app with all books of the KJV Bible

ğŸ’ŒKEEP IN TOUCH WITH KJV BIBLE APP
- Send us Email: cs@idailybread.org
- Visit our website: http: //www.idailybread.org
- Like us on Facebook: https://business.facebook.com/KJVBibleStudyApp/

ğŸ™ğŸ™ğŸ™King James Bible - KJV Bible, Free Holy Bible App keeps Godâ€™s teaching at your fingertips. A pocket bible, a KJV bible on the go. King James Bible App helps you learn Godâ€™s Word anytime, anywhere you want. Now get started on this exciting journey and spend time with God! ğŸ™ğŸ™ğŸ™
